dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S1847 : To provide for the redesignation of the Asia-Pacific Center for Security Studies as the Daniel K. Inouye Asia-Pacific Center for Security Studies.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Hirono (for herself, Mr. Chambliss, and Mr. Schatz) introduced the following bill; which was read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed

form.official-title: To provide for the redesignation of the Asia-Pacific Center for Security Studies as the Daniel K. Inouye Asia-Pacific Center for Security Studies.

section.header: Redesignation of the Asia-Pacific Center for Security Studies as the Daniel K. Inouye Asia-Pacific Center for Security Studies

subsection.text: The Department of Defense regional center for security studies known as the Asia-Pacific Center for Security Studies is hereby renamed the Daniel K. Inouye Asia-Pacific Center for Security Studies.

paragraph.header: Reference to regional centers for security studies
paragraph.text: Subparagraph (B) of section 184(b)(2) of title 10, United States Code, is amended to read as follows:

subparagraph.text: The Daniel K. Inouye Asia-Pacific Center for Security Studies.

paragraph.text: Subparagraph (B) of section 2611(a)(2) of such title is amended to read as follows:

subparagraph.text: The Daniel K. Inouye Asia-Pacific Center for Security Studies.

subsection.text: Any reference to the Department of Defense Asia-Pacific Center for Security Studies in any law, regulation, map, document, record, or other paper of the United States shall be deemed to be a reference to the Daniel K. Inouye Asia-Pacific Center for Security Studies.
